Parameters: A status code indicating the result of the operation.
The state key for the data that was loaded, if available.
onStateDeleted(int, int).Description: Called when app state data has been deleted. Possible status codes include: @B_com#google#android#gms#appstate#AppStateClient#STATUS_OK_E@ if data was successfully deleted from the server. @B_com#google#android#gms#appstate#AppStateClient#STATUS_NETWORK_ERROR_OPERATION_FAILED_E@ if the device was unable to communicate with the network. In this case, the operation is not retried automatically. @B_com#google#android#gms#appstate#AppStateClient#STATUS_CLIENT_RECONNECT_REQUIRED_E@ if the @B_com#google#android#gms#appstate#AppStateClient_E@ needs to reconnect to the service to access this data. @B_com#google#android#gms#appstate#AppStateClient#STATUS_INTERNAL_ERROR_E@ if an unexpected error occurred in the service.
onStateDeleted(int, int).FullName: public abstract void onStateDeleted (int statusCode, int stateKey)

ClassDesc: Listener for receiving callbacks when app state data has been deleted.
